document_title: Pubic lice: Causes, signs, treatment, prevention
subsection_content: Pubic lice are spread from person to person through close contact, especially sexual intercourse. In addition, sharing personal items such as towels, bed sheets and clothes also indirectly causes pubic lice.
subsection_title: benh ran mu.json. Causes of pubic lice
subsection_data:
benh ran mu.json. Causes of pubic lice
Pubic lice are spread from person to person through close contact, especially sexual intercourse. In addition, sharing personal items such as towels, bed sheets and clothes also indirectly causes pubic lice.
